input.sentences: my new wife looks so beautiful !
our little flower girl and ring bearer !
my wife and i are finally married !
my sister in law the maid of honor .
time to dance everyone is having so much fun !
output.sentences: Annie made a beautiful wife, beaming beside her husband.
The ring bearer and the flower girl werer her littlest cousins and completely adorable.
Annie said family law dictated that her sister must be the maid of honor, but she did not mind, as she would have picked her anyway.
Annie isn't known for filtering her thoughts, so she yelled out, "I'm a wife, finally, on her way out of the church.
Afterwards, it was time to have fun and dance at the reception.
